body: Create HB surface does convert meshes to breps under the hood as Tasos mentioned but it can be very time-consuming. I usually re-create the geometries with a similar process as Tasos mentioned. There is also a component for MergeBreps in Grasshopper. Another option is to use the [new development by Max](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/sketchup-dynamo-grasshopper-maximilian-thumfart?trk=hp-feed-article-title-share#). I haven't tested it myself but should be a much cleaner solution: [](https://media.licdn.com/mpr/mpr/jc/AAEAAQAAAAAAAAXEAAAAJDMwYTVlOTEzLTJkMWMtNGYwMC04MzY3LThjNzU1NWVhNTFiMw.png) Here is the project on github: [https://github.com/moethu/SketchUpNET](https://github.com/moethu/SketchUpNET)
